sentences.en: Acetic acid is formed as an intermediate in the anaerobic fermentation of carbohydrates, proteins, and fats.
sentences.cn: 醋酸是碳水化合物, 蛋白质和脂肪在厌氧发酵时所形成的中间体.

sentences.en: Alcohol may be made by fermentation of many plants.
sentences.cn: 许多植物经过发酵可以提炼出酒精.

sentences.en: At that time, any fish caught had to be preserved. The only method possible was by fermentation.
sentences.cn: 在那个年代，所有捕来的鱼都要被贮存起来，唯一可能的贮存方法就是发酵。

sentences.en: Biotechnology includes gene engineering, cell engineering, enzyme engineering, fermentation engineering, etc.
sentences.cn: 生物技术包括基因工程 、 细胞工程 、 酶工程 、 发酵工程等.

sentences.en: Botany, zoology, biochemistry and molecular biology, cell biology, microbiology, genetics, fermentation engineering.
sentences.cn: 植物学, 动物学, 生物化学与分子生物学, 细胞生物学, 微生物学, 遗传学, 发酵工程.

sentences.en: But thrumming underneath it is a deep layer of culinary funkreminiscent of fermentation.
sentences.cn: 但敲打底部是深一层的使人想起的厨房的恐怖的发酵。

sentences.en: During alcoholic fermentation acetaldehyde acts as a hydrogen acceptor instead of oxygen.
sentences.cn: 在这个过程中乙醛取代了氧作为氢的受体.

sentences.en: Fermentation also makes bread dough rise and helps us digest food.
sentences.cn: 利用发酵也可以使做面包的面团发起来,还能帮助我们消化食物.

sentences.en: In such a natural fermentation , a complex succession of changes take place in the yeast population.
sentences.cn: 在这种自然发酵过程中,酵母区系发生一系列复杂的变化.

sentences.en: In the process of soybean milk and fermentation, soybean beany flavor is described by the unpleasant smelling consisted of the acerbity, bitter and grass - smelling component.
sentences.cn: 摘要在豆乳或发酵豆乳的加工中，大豆涩味、苦味和青草味成分物质所构成的不良异味，被人们描述为大豆腥味。

sentences.en: It acts as a catalyst in the process of fermentation.
sentences.cn: 它在发酵过程中起触媒的作用.

sentences.en: So with the exception of the fermentation process, beer and ale are basically the same thing!
sentences.cn: 除了发酵工序有区别之外, 啤酒和爱尔啤酒其实是一回事!

sentences.en: Sparkling wine undergo a second alcoholic fermentation.
sentences.cn: 发泡葡萄酒需要二次发酵作用.

sentences.en: Sugar is added to the wine during fermentation to increase the alcohol level.
sentences.cn: 发酵时在葡萄酒里加糖以提高酒精浓度.

sentences.en: The fermentation of many sugurs, alcohols, and glucosides by strains of P . multocida is quite variable.
sentences.cn: 多余性巴氏杆菌各菌株对多种糖, 醇, 糖苷的发酵是很不同的.

sentences.en: The process, in which the tea develops its characteristic astringency, is known as fermentation.
sentences.cn: 茶开始散发涩味的过程称作发酵。

sentences.en: They baited others with CO2 produced by fermentation when yeast is mixed with a sugar solution.
sentences.cn: 他们用酵母与糖溶液混合后发酵产生的CO2作为另一些陷阱的饵。

sentences.en: Yeasts are used in the brewing process to initiate fermentation.
sentences.cn: 酵母菌可以使啤酒的发酵过程得以启动.

phrases.tran_cn: 需氧发酵；好气发酵；需气发酵
发酵技术，发酵工艺；发酵工程
